blocks.name: cpc
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the prime count function.
blocks.origin: const class cpc { pCnt }

diff.cpc.c

df-pc
blocks.content: Define the prime count function, which returns the largest exponent of a given prime (or other positive integer) that divides the number. For rational numbers, it returns negative values according to the power of a prime in the denominator. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-pc(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cpc, cmpo(s0, s1, cprime, cq, cif(cpnf, cio(s2, wrex(s3, cz, wrex(s4, cn, wa(wceq(cv(s1), co(cv(s3), cdiv, cv(s4))), wceq(cv(s2), co(csup(crab(s5, cn0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s5)), cdvds, cv(s3))), cr, clt), cmin, csup(crab(s5, cn0, wbr(co(cv(s0), cexp, cv(s5)), cdvds, cv(s4))), cr, clt))))))), wceq(cv(s1), nat0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
}

  ⊢ pCnt =(s0 ∈ Prime, s1 ∈ ℚ ↦ if(s1 = 0, +∞, iota(s2, ∃(s3 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s4 ∈ ℕ,(s1 =(s3[÷]s4)∧ s2 =(sup({ s5 ∈ ℕ0 |(s0[^]s5)[||]s3 }, ℝ, <)[-]sup({ s5 ∈ ℕ0 |(s0[^]s5)[||]s4 }, ℝ, <))))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s5)
  ⊣ d(s1, s5)
  ⊣ d(s3, s5)
  ⊣ d(s4, s5)
  ⊣ d(s2, s5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s4)

blocks.name: pcprecl
blocks.content: Closure of the prime power pre-function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm pcprecl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))), wa(wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(co(c0, cexp, c2), cdvds, c1)))
  -| wceq(c3, crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, csup(c3, cr, clt))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylib(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))), wa(wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(co(c0, cexp, c2), cdvds, c1)), wcel(c2, c3))
  syl5eqel(c2, c3, csup(c3, cr, clt), wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))), wcel(csup(c3, cr, clt), c3), w3a(wss(c3, cz), wne(c3, emptycls), wrex(hs1, cz, wral(hs0, c3, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs1))))))
  pclem(hs1, hs0, s0, c0, c1, c3)
  suprzcl2(hs1, hs0, c3)
  elrab2(hs2, c2, c3, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, c2), cdvds, c1), wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs2)), cdvds, c1))
  breq1d(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs2)), cdvds, c1, co(c0, cexp, c2), wceq(cv(hs2), c2))
  oveq2(cv(hs2), c2, c0, cexp)
  eqtri(c3, crab(hs2, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs2)), cdvds, c1)), crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, c1)))
  cbvrabv(s0, hs2, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, c1), wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs2)), cdvds, c1))
  breq1d(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, c1, co(c0, cexp, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs2)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs2), c0, cexp)

thm pcprecl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2)∧(c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ≠ 0))→(c2 ∈ ℕ0 ∧(c0[^]c2)[||]c1))
  ⊣ c3 = { s0 ∈ ℕ0 |(c0[^]s0)[||]c1 }
  ⊣ c2 = sup(c3, ℝ, <)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylib((c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2)∧(c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ≠ 0)), (c2 ∈ ℕ0 ∧(c0[^]c2)[||]c1), c2 ∈ c3)
  syl5eqel(c2, c3, sup(c3, ℝ, <), (c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2)∧(c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ≠ 0)))
  syl((c0 ∈(ℤ≥ ` 2)∧(c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ≠ 0)), sup(c3, ℝ, <)∈ c3, (c3 ⊆ ℤ ∧ c3 ≠ ∅ ∧ ∃(hs1 ∈ ℤ, ∀(hs0 ∈ c3, hs0[≤]hs1))))
  pclem(hs1, hs0, s0, c0, c1, c3)
  suprzcl2(hs1, hs0, c3)
  elrab2(hs2, c2, c3, cn0, (c0[^]c2)[||]c1, (c0[^]hs2)[||]c1)

  oveq2(hs2, c2, c0, cexp)
  eqtri(c3, { hs2 ∈ ℕ0 |(c0[^]hs2)[||]c1 }, { s0 ∈ ℕ0 |(c0[^]s0)[||]c1 })
  cbvrabv(s0, hs2, cn0, (c0[^]s0)[||]c1, (c0[^]hs2)[||]c1)
  breq1d((c0[^]s0), cdvds, c1, (c0[^]hs2), s0 = hs2)

  diff.hs0.c(c3)

  diff.cn0.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, (c0[^]hs2), cdvds, c1)

}

  sylan2(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wceq(c1, nat1), wa(wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(co(c0, cexp, c2), cdvds, c1)), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0)))

  adantr(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wceq(c1, nat1), wbr(nat1, clt, c0))
  eluz2gt1(c0)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wceq(c1, nat1)), wb(wbr(c2, cle, nat0), wceq(c2, nat0)), wcel(c2, cn0))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)), wceq(c1, nat1), wcel(c2, cn0), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0)))

blocks.name: pcpremul
blocks.content: Multiplicative property of the prime count pre-function. Note that the primality of ` P ` is essential for this property; ` ( 4 pCnt 2 ) = 0 ` but ` ( 4 pCnt ( 2 x. 2 ) ) = 1 =/= 2 x. ( 4 pCnt 2 ) = 0 ` . Since this is needed to show uniqueness for the real prime count function (over ` QQ ` ), we don't bother to define it off the primes. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm pcpremul(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(c3, caddc, c4), c5))
  -| wceq(c3, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, c1)), cr, clt))
  -| wceq(c4, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, c2)), cr, clt))
  -| wceq(c5, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, co(c1, cmul, c2))), cr, clt))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {

blocks.name: pcval
blocks.content: The value of the prime power function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2014.)

thm pcval(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cq), wne(c1, nat0))), wceq(co(c0, cpc, c1), cio(s0, wrex(s1, cz, wrex(s2, cn, wa(wceq(c1, co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s0), co(c2, cmin, c3))))))))
  -| wceq(c2, csup(crab(s3, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s3)), cdvds, cv(s1))), cr, clt))
  -| wceq(c3, csup(crab(s3, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s3)), cdvds, cv(s2))), cr, clt))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cq), wne(c1, nat0))), wceq(co(c0, cpc, c1), cio(s0, wrex(s1, cz, wrex(s2, cn, wa(wceq(c1, co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s0), co(c2, cmin, c3)))))))), diffsc(s0, c2))

  ovmpt2a(hs0, hs1, c0, cprime, c1, cq, cpc, cif(cpnf, cio(s0, wrex(s1, cz, wrex(s2, cn, wa(wceq(c1, co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s0), co(c2, cmin, c3)))))), wceq(c1, nat0)), cif(cpnf, cio(s0, wrex(s1, cz, wrex(s2, cn, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s0), co(csup(crab(s3, cn0, wbr(co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s3)), cdvds, cv(s1))), cr, clt), cmin, csup(crab(s3, cn0, wbr(co(cv(hs0), cexp, cv(s3)), cdvds, cv(s2))), cr, clt))))))), wceq(cv(hs1), nat0)))

  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Prime ∧(c1 ∈ ℚ ∧ c1 ≠ 0))→(c0[pCnt]c1)= iota(s0, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s2 ∈ ℕ,(c1 =(s1[÷]s2)∧ s0 =(c2[-]c3))))))
  ⊣ c2 = sup({ s3 ∈ ℕ0 |(c0[^]s3)[||]s1 }, ℝ, <)
  ⊣ c3 = sup({ s3 ∈ ℕ0 |(c0[^]s3)[||]s2 }, ℝ, <)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

  ⊣ d(s2, s3)

  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ Prime ∧(c1 ∈ ℚ ∧ c1 ≠ 0))→(c0[pCnt]c1)= iota(s0, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s2 ∈ ℕ,(c1 =(s1[÷]s2)∧ s0 =(c2[-]c3)))))), d(s0, c2))
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ Prime ∧(c1 ∈ ℚ ∧ c1 ≠ 0))→(c0[pCnt]c1)= iota(s0, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s2 ∈ ℕ,(c1 =(s1[÷]s2)∧ s0 =(c2[-]c3)))))), d(s0, c3))
  a1ii(((c0 ∈ Prime ∧(c1 ∈ ℚ ∧ c1 ≠ 0))→(c0[pCnt]c1)= iota(s0, ∃(s1 ∈ ℤ, ∃(s2 ∈ ℕ,(c1 =(s1[÷]s2)∧ s0 =(c2[-]c3)))))), d(s3, c1))

  eqeq1d(hs1, nat0, c1, (hs0 = c0 ∧ hs1 = c1))

  supeq1d({ s3 ∈ ℕ0 |(hs0[^]s3)[||]s2 }, cr, clt, { s3 ∈ ℕ0 |(c0[^]s3)[||]s2 }, hs0 = c0)

thm pceulem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3)))
  -| wceq(c0, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c4, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(s1))), cr, clt))
  -| wceq(c1, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c4, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(s2))), cr, clt))
  -| wceq(c2, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c4, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(s3))), cr, clt))
  -| wceq(c3, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c4, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(s4))), cr, clt))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cprime))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c5, nat0))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cz), wcel(cv(s2), cn)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, co(cv(s1), cdiv, cv(s2))))
  -| wi(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s3), cz), wcel(cv(s4), cn)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, co(cv(s3), cdiv, cv(s4))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c4)
  -| diffsc(s3, c5)
  -| diffsc(s4, c0)
  -| diffsc(s4, c1)
  -| diffsc(s4, c4)
  -| diffsc(s4, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffss(s1, s2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffss(s1, s3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffss(s1, s4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffss(s2, s3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffss(s2, s4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffss(s3, s4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffsc(s0, c5))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffsc(s1, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffsc(s1, c5))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffsc(s2, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffsc(s2, c5))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffsc(s3, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffsc(s3, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffsc(s3, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffsc(s3, c5))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffsc(s4, c0))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffsc(s4, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffsc(s4, c4))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3))), diffsc(s4, c5))
  mpbid(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmin, c1), co(c2, cmin, c3)), wceq(co(c1, caddc, c2), co(c0, caddc, c3)))

blocks.name: pceu
blocks.content: Uniqueness for the prime power function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  -| wceq(c3, csup(crab(s3, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s3)), cdvds, cv(s2))), cr, clt))

blocks.name: pczpre
blocks.content: Connect the prime count pre-function to the actual prime count function, when restricted to the integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2014.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm pczpre(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))), wceq(co(c0, cpc, c1), c2))
  -| wceq(c2, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, c1)), cr, clt))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, cpc, c1), c2, cio(hs2, wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cn, wa(wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs2), co(csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cr, clt), cmin, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs1))), cr, clt))))))), wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))))
  sylanr1(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0), wceq(co(c0, cpc, c1), cio(hs2, wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cn, wa(wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs2), co(csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cr, clt), cmin, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs1))), cr, clt)))))))), wcel(c1, cq))
  pcval(hs2, hs0, hs1, s0, c0, c1, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cr, clt), csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs1))), cr, clt))
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))), wceq(cio(hs2, wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cn, wa(wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs2), co(csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cr, clt), cmin, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs1))), cr, clt))))))), c2), wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cn, wa(wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), wceq(c2, co(csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cr, clt), cmin, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs1))), cr, clt)))))))

  div1d(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))))
  zcnd(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))))
  simprl(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))
  eqtr2d(c2, co(c2, cmin, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, nat1)), cr, clt)), co(c2, cmin, nat0), wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))))
  oveq2d(c2, cmin, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, nat1)), cr, clt), nat0, wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))))

  nn0cnd(c2, wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))))
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(co(c0, cexp, c2), cdvds, c1))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(co(c0, cexp, c2), cdvds, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  prmuz2(c0)
  pcprecl(s0, c0, c1, c2, crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, c1)))
  eqid(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, c1)))
  mp3an2(wcel(c1, cz), wa(wceq(c1, co(c1, cdiv, nat1)), wceq(c2, co(c2, cmin, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, nat1)), cr, clt)))), wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cn, wa(wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), wceq(c2, co(csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cr, clt), cmin, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs1))), cr, clt)))))), wcel(nat1, cn))
  1nn()
  rspc2ev(hs0, hs1, c1, cz, nat1, cn, wa(wceq(c1, co(c1, cdiv, nat1)), wceq(c2, co(c2, cmin, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, nat1)), cr, clt)))), wa(wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), wceq(c2, co(csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cr, clt), cmin, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs1))), cr, clt)))), wa(wceq(c1, co(c1, cdiv, cv(hs1))), wceq(c2, co(c2, cmin, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs1))), cr, clt)))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), wceq(c2, co(csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cr, clt), cmin, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs1))), cr, clt))), wceq(c1, co(c1, cdiv, cv(hs1))), wceq(c2, co(c2, cmin, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs1))), cr, clt))))
  eqeq2d(c1, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1)), co(c1, cdiv, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c1, cdiv, cv(hs1))
  eqeq2d(c2, co(csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cr, clt), cmin, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs1))), cr, clt)), co(c2, cmin, csup(crab(s0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, cv(hs1))), cr, clt)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))

blocks.name: pczcl
blocks.content: Closure of the prime power function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm pczcl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))), wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn0))
} = {
  eqeltrd(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn0, csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c1)), cr, clt), wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))))
  pczpre(hs0, c0, c1, csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c1)), cr, clt))
  simpld(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0))), wcel(csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c1)), cr, clt), cn0), wbr(co(c0, cexp, csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c1)), cr, clt)), cdvds, c1))
  sylan(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c1)), cr, clt), cn0), wbr(co(c0, cexp, csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c1)), cr, clt)), cdvds, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cuz, nat2)))
  prmuz2(c0)
  pcprecl(hs0, c0, c1, csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c1)), cr, clt), crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c1)))
  eqid(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c1)))
  eqid(csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c1)), cr, clt))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm pcmul(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(c0, cpc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(co(c0, cpc, c1), caddc, co(c0, cpc, c2))))
} = {
  3eqtr4rd(co(c0, cpc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(co(c0, cpc, c1), caddc, co(c0, cpc, c2)), co(csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c1)), cr, clt), caddc, csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c2)), cr, clt)), csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, co(c1, cmul, c2))), cr, clt), w3a(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0))))
  pcpremul(hs0, c0, c1, c2, csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c1)), cr, clt), csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c2)), cr, clt), csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, co(c1, cmul, c2))), cr, clt))
  oveq12d(co(c0, cpc, c1), caddc, co(c0, cpc, c2), csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c1)), cr, clt), csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c2)), cr, clt), w3a(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0))))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cpc, c1), csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c1)), cr, clt)))
  pczpre(hs0, c0, c1, csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c1)), cr, clt))
  eqid(csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c1)), cr, clt))
  3adant2(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cpc, c2), csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c2)), cr, clt)))
  pczpre(hs0, c0, c2, csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c2)), cr, clt))
  eqid(csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, c2)), cr, clt))
  3impb(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cpc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, co(c1, cmul, c2))), cr, clt)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(c0, cpc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, co(c1, cmul, c2))), cr, clt)), wa(wcel(co(c1, cmul, c2), cz), wne(co(c1, cmul, c2), nat0)))
  jca(wa(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0))), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c2), cz), wne(co(c1, cmul, c2), nat0))
  ad2ant2r(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0), wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c2), cz))
  zmulcl(c1, c2)
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0)), wne(co(c1, cmul, c2), nat0), wa(wcel(c1, cc), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cc), wne(c2, nat0)))
  anim1i(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0), wcel(c1, cc))
  zcn(c1)
  anim1i(wcel(c2, cz), wne(c2, nat0), wcel(c2, cc))
  zcn(c2)
  mulne0(c1, c2)
  pczpre(hs0, c0, co(c1, cmul, c2), csup(crab(hs0, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), cdvds, co(c1, cmul, c2))), cr, clt))

  pcval(hs2, hs0, hs1, hs3, c0, co(c1, cdiv, c2), csup(crab(hs3, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs3)), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cr, clt), csup(crab(hs3, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs3)), cdvds, cv(hs1))), cr, clt))
  mpbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cz), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(c2, cn)), wceq(cio(hs2, wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cn, wa(wceq(co(c1, cdiv, c2), co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs2), co(csup(crab(hs3, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs3)), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cr, clt), cmin, csup(crab(hs3, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs3)), cdvds, cv(hs1))), cr, clt))))))), co(co(c0, cpc, c1), cmin, co(c0, cpc, c2))), wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cn, wa(wceq(co(c1, cdiv, c2), co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))), wceq(co(co(c0, cpc, c1), cmin, co(c0, cpc, c2)), co(csup(crab(hs3, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs3)), cdvds, cv(hs0))), cr, clt), cmin, csup(crab(hs3, cn0, wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(hs3)), cdvds, cv(hs1))), cr, clt)))))))

blocks.name: pcqmul
blocks.content: Multiplication property of the prime power function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm pcqmul(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cq), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cq), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(c0, cpc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(co(c0, cpc, c1), caddc, co(c0, cpc, c2))))
} = {
  mp2and(w3a(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cq), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cq), wne(c2, nat0))), wceq(co(c0, cpc, co(c1, cmul, c2)), co(co(c0, cpc, c1), caddc, co(c0, cpc, c2))), wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cn, wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))))), wrex(hs2, cz, wrex(hs3, cn, wceq(c2, co(cv(hs2), cdiv, cv(hs3))))))
  sylib(w3a(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cq), wne(c1, nat0)), wa(wcel(c2, cq), wne(c2, nat0))), wrex(hs0, cz, wrex(hs1, cn, wceq(c1, co(cv(hs0), cdiv, cv(hs1))))), wcel(c1, cq))
  simp2l(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cq), wne(c1, nat0), wa(wcel(c2, cq), wne(c2, nat0)))

blocks.name: pcxcl
blocks.content: Extended real closure of the general prime count function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm pcxcl(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cq)), wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cxr))
} = {
  pm2.61dne(c1, nat0, wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cq)), wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cxr))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cq)), wceq(c1, nat0), wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cxr), wcel(co(c0, cpc, nat0), cxr))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cq), wcel(co(c0, cpc, nat0), cxr))
  syl6eqel(co(c0, cpc, nat0), cxr, cpnf, wcel(c0, cprime))
  pc0(c0)
  pnfxr()
  eleq1d(co(c0, cpc, c1), cxr, co(c0, cpc, nat0), wceq(c1, nat0))
  oveq2(c1, nat0, c0, cpc)
  expr(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cq), wne(c1, nat0), wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cxr))
  rexrd(co(c0, cpc, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cq), wne(c1, nat0))))
  zred(co(c0, cpc, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wa(wcel(c1, cq), wne(c1, nat0))))
  pcqcl(c0, c1)
}

thm pcxcl(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℚ)→(c0[pCnt]c1)∈ ℝ*)
} = {

blocks.name: pcdvdsb
blocks.content: ` P ^ A ` divides ` N ` if and only if ` A ` is at most the count of ` P ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2014.)

blocks.name: pcelnn
blocks.content: There are a positive number of powers of a prime ` P ` in ` N ` iff ` P ` divides ` N ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm pcelnn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wb(wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1)))
} = {
  3bitr3d(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn), wbr(c0, cdvds, c1), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cpc, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cexp, nat1), cdvds, c1))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn), wb(wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cpc, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cexp, nat1), cdvds, c1)), wcel(c1, cz))
  nnz(c1)
  mp3an3(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cz), wb(wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cpc, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cexp, nat1), cdvds, c1)), wcel(nat1, cn0))
  1nn0()
  pcdvdsb(c0, c1, nat1)
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wb(wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cpc, c1)), wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn)), wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn0))
  pccl(c0, c1)
  baibr(wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn0), wbr(nat1, cle, co(c0, cpc, c1)), wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn))
  elnnnn0c(co(c0, cpc, c1))
  breq1d(co(c0, cexp, nat1), cdvds, c1, c0, wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn), wceq(co(c0, cexp, nat1), c0))
  exp1d(c0, wcel(c0, cprime))
  nncnd(c0, wcel(c0, cprime))
  prmnn(c0)
}

blocks.name: pceq0
blocks.content: There are zero powers of a prime ` P ` in ` N ` iff ` P ` does not divide ` N ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2014.)

thm pceq0(class c0, class c1) {

  pccl(c0, c1)

  nnne0(co(c0, cpc, c1))
  necon1ad(co(c0, cpc, c1), nat0, wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn0), wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn))
  ord(wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn0), wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn), wceq(co(c0, cpc, c1), nat0))
  biimpi(wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn0), wo(wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn), wceq(co(c0, cpc, c1), nat0)))
  elnn0(co(c0, cpc, c1))

  pcneg(c0, c1)

  mpbid(((c0 ∈ Prime ∧(c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1[||]c2))∧ c1 = 0), c2 = 0, 0[||]c2)
  eqbrtrrd(nat0, cdvds, c2, c1, ((c0 ∈ Prime ∧(c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1[||]c2))∧ c1 = 0))

  syl12anc(((c0 ∈ Prime ∧(c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1[||]c2))∧ c1 ≠ 0), (c0[^](c0[pCnt]c1))[||]c1, c0 ∈ Prime, c1 ∈ ℤ, c1 ≠ 0)

blocks.name: pcgcd1

blocks.name: pcgcd
blocks.content: The prime count of a GCD is the minimum of the prime counts of the arguments. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2014.)

  pm2.61dan(w3a(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cz), wcel(c2, cz)), wceq(co(c0, cpc, co(c1, cgcd, c2)), cif(co(c0, cpc, c1), co(c0, cpc, c2), wbr(co(c0, cpc, c1), cle, co(c0, cpc, c2)))), wbr(co(c0, cpc, c1), cle, co(c0, cpc, c2)))

thm pcgcd(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)→(c0[pCnt](c1[gcd]c2))= if((c0[pCnt]c1)[≤](c0[pCnt]c2),(c0[pCnt]c1),(c0[pCnt]c2)))
} = {
  pm2.61dan((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), (c0[pCnt](c1[gcd]c2))= if((c0[pCnt]c1)[≤](c0[pCnt]c2),(c0[pCnt]c1),(c0[pCnt]c2)), (c0[pCnt]c1)[≤](c0[pCnt]c2))

  pcgcd1(c0, c1, c2)
  adantl((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), (c0[pCnt]c1)[≤](c0[pCnt]c2), if((c0[pCnt]c1)[≤](c0[pCnt]c2),(c0[pCnt]c1),(c0[pCnt]c2))=(c0[pCnt]c1))
  iftrue((c0[pCnt]c1), (c0[pCnt]c2), (c0[pCnt]c1)[≤](c0[pCnt]c2))
  eqtr4d((c0[pCnt](c1[gcd]c2)), if((c0[pCnt]c1)[≤](c0[pCnt]c2),(c0[pCnt]c1),(c0[pCnt]c2)), (c0[pCnt](c2[gcd]c1)), ((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)∧ ¬(c0[pCnt]c1)[≤](c0[pCnt]c2)))
  oveq2d(c0, cpc, (c1[gcd]c2), (c2[gcd]c1), ((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)∧ ¬(c0[pCnt]c1)[≤](c0[pCnt]c2)))
  adantr((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), ¬(c0[pCnt]c1)[≤](c0[pCnt]c2), (c1[gcd]c2)=(c2[gcd]c1))
  3adant1(c0 ∈ Prime, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℤ, (c1[gcd]c2)=(c2[gcd]c1))
  gcdcom(c1, c2)
  eqtr4d(if((c0[pCnt]c1)[≤](c0[pCnt]c2),(c0[pCnt]c1),(c0[pCnt]c2)), (c0[pCnt](c2[gcd]c1)), (c0[pCnt]c2), ((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ)∧ ¬(c0[pCnt]c1)[≤](c0[pCnt]c2)))
  adantl((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), ¬(c0[pCnt]c1)[≤](c0[pCnt]c2), if((c0[pCnt]c1)[≤](c0[pCnt]c2),(c0[pCnt]c1),(c0[pCnt]c2))=(c0[pCnt]c2))
  iffalse((c0[pCnt]c1), (c0[pCnt]c2), (c0[pCnt]c1)[≤](c0[pCnt]c2))

  orcanai((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ ∧ c2 ∈ ℤ), (c0[pCnt]c1)[≤](c0[pCnt]c2), (c0[pCnt]c2)[≤](c0[pCnt]c1))
  3imp3i2an(c0 ∈ Prime, c1 ∈ ℤ, c2 ∈ ℤ, ((c0[pCnt]c1)[≤](c0[pCnt]c2)∨(c0[pCnt]c2)[≤](c0[pCnt]c1)), (c0[pCnt]c1)∈ ℝ*, (c0[pCnt]c2)∈ ℝ*)

blocks.name: pc11
blocks.content: The prime count function, viewed as a function from ` NN ` to ` ( NN ^m Prime ) ` , is one-to-one. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Feb-2014.)

thm pc11(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0)→(c0 = c1 ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[pCnt]c0)=(s0[pCnt]c1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbid2((c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0), c0 = c1, ∀(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[pCnt]c0)=(s0[pCnt]c1)))
  ralrimivw(s0, cprime, c0 = c1, (s0[pCnt]c0)=(s0[pCnt]c1))
  oveq2(c0, c1, s0, cpc)
  sylbid((c0 ∈ ℕ0 ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0), ∀(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[pCnt]c0)=(s0[pCnt]c1)), c0 = c1, (c0[||]c1 ∧ c1[||]c0))
  syl2an(c0 ∈ ℕ0, c1 ∈ ℕ0, (∀(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[pCnt]c0)=(s0[pCnt]c1))↔(c0[||]c1 ∧ c1[||]c0)), c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ ℤ)
  nn0z(c0)
  nn0z(c1)
  bitr4d((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), ∀(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[pCnt]c0)=(s0[pCnt]c1)), (c0[||]c1 ∧ c1[||]c0), (∀(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[pCnt]c0)[≤](s0[pCnt]c1))∧ ∀(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[pCnt]c1)[≤](s0[pCnt]c0))))
  syl6bb((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), ∀(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[pCnt]c0)=(s0[pCnt]c1)), (∀(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[pCnt]c0)[≤](s0[pCnt]c1))∧ ∀(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[pCnt]c1)[≤](s0[pCnt]c0))), ∀(s0 ∈ Prime,((s0[pCnt]c0)[≤](s0[pCnt]c1)∧(s0[pCnt]c1)[≤](s0[pCnt]c0))))
  ralbidva(s0, cprime, (c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), (s0[pCnt]c0)=(s0[pCnt]c1), ((s0[pCnt]c0)[≤](s0[pCnt]c1)∧(s0[pCnt]c1)[≤](s0[pCnt]c0)))
  ancoms((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), s0 ∈ Prime, ((s0[pCnt]c0)=(s0[pCnt]c1)↔((s0[pCnt]c0)[≤](s0[pCnt]c1)∧(s0[pCnt]c1)[≤](s0[pCnt]c0))))

  xrletri3((s0[pCnt]c0), (s0[pCnt]c1))

  anbi12d((c0 ∈ ℤ ∧ c1 ∈ ℤ), c0[||]c1, c1[||]c0, ∀(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[pCnt]c0)[≤](s0[pCnt]c1)), ∀(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[pCnt]c1)[≤](s0[pCnt]c0)))

thm pcz(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ ℚ →(c0 ∈ ℤ ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ Prime, 0[≤](s0[pCnt]c0))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  impbid2(c0 ∈ ℚ, c0 ∈ ℤ, ∀(s0 ∈ Prime, 0[≤](s0[pCnt]c0)))
  ralrimiva(s0, cprime, c0 ∈ ℤ, 0[≤](s0[pCnt]c0))
  ancoms(c0 ∈ ℤ, s0 ∈ Prime, 0[≤](s0[pCnt]c0))
  pcge0(s0, c0)
  sylbi(c0 ∈ ℚ, (∀(s0 ∈ Prime, 0[≤](s0[pCnt]c0))→ c0 ∈ ℤ), ∃(hs0 ∈ ℤ, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℕ, c0 =(hs0[÷]hs1))))
  elq(hs0, hs1, c0)
  rexlimivv(hs0, hs1, cz, cn, c0 =(hs0[÷]hs1), (∀(s0 ∈ Prime, 0[≤](s0[pCnt]c0))→ c0 ∈ ℤ))
  syl5ibrcom((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ), c0 =(hs0[÷]hs1), (∀(s0 ∈ Prime, 0[≤](s0[pCnt]c0))→ c0 ∈ ℤ), (∀(s0 ∈ Prime, 0[≤](s0[pCnt](hs0[÷]hs1)))→(hs0[÷]hs1)∈ ℤ))
  sylibd((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ), ∀(s0 ∈ Prime, 0[≤](s0[pCnt](hs0[÷]hs1))), (hs0[÷]hs1)∈ ℤ, hs1[||]hs0)
  pm2.61dane(hs0, nat0, (hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ), (∀(s0 ∈ Prime, 0[≤](s0[pCnt](hs0[÷]hs1)))→ hs1[||]hs0))
  a1d(((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ)∧ hs0 = 0), ∀(s0 ∈ Prime, 0[≤](s0[pCnt](hs0[÷]hs1))), hs1[||]hs0)
  breqtrrd(hs1, cdvds, hs0, nat0, ((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ)∧ hs0 = 0))
  ad2antlr(hs0 ∈ ℤ, hs1 ∈ ℕ, hs0 = 0, hs1[||]0)
  syl(hs1 ∈ ℕ, hs1[||]0, hs1 ∈ ℤ)
  dvds0(hs1)

  biimpd(((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ)∧ hs0 ≠ 0), ∀(s0 ∈ Prime, 0[≤](s0[pCnt](hs0[÷]hs1))), hs1[||]hs0)
  bitr4d(((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ)∧ hs0 ≠ 0), ∀(s0 ∈ Prime, 0[≤](s0[pCnt](hs0[÷]hs1))), hs1[||]hs0, ∀(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[pCnt]hs1)[≤](s0[pCnt]hs0)))
  ralbidva(s0, cprime, ((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ)∧ hs0 ≠ 0), 0[≤](s0[pCnt](hs0[÷]hs1)), (s0[pCnt]hs1)[≤](s0[pCnt]hs0))
  bitrd((((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ)∧ hs0 ≠ 0)∧ s0 ∈ Prime), 0[≤](s0[pCnt](hs0[÷]hs1)), (s0[pCnt]hs1)[≤](s0[pCnt]hs0), 0[≤]((s0[pCnt]hs0)[-](s0[pCnt]hs1)))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, (s0[pCnt](hs0[÷]hs1)), ((s0[pCnt]hs0)[-](s0[pCnt]hs1)), (((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ)∧ hs0 ≠ 0)∧ s0 ∈ Prime))
  syl121anc((((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ)∧ hs0 ≠ 0)∧ s0 ∈ Prime), (s0[pCnt](hs0[÷]hs1))=((s0[pCnt]hs0)[-](s0[pCnt]hs1)), s0 ∈ Prime, hs0 ∈ ℤ, hs0 ≠ 0, hs1 ∈ ℕ)
  pcdiv(s0, hs0, hs1)
  subge0d((s0[pCnt]hs0), (s0[pCnt]hs1), (((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ)∧ hs0 ≠ 0)∧ s0 ∈ Prime))
  nn0red((s0[pCnt]hs0), (((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ)∧ hs0 ≠ 0)∧ s0 ∈ Prime))
  syl12anc((((hs0 ∈ ℤ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ)∧ hs0 ≠ 0)∧ s0 ∈ Prime), (s0[pCnt]hs0)∈ ℕ0, s0 ∈ Prime, hs0 ∈ ℤ, hs0 ≠ 0)

  syl2an23an(hs0 ∈ ℤ, hs1 ∈ ℕ, (hs1[||]hs0 ↔(hs0[÷]hs1)∈ ℤ), hs1 ∈ ℤ, hs1 ≠ 0, hs0 ∈ ℤ)
  nnz(hs1)
  nnne0(hs1)
  simpl(hs0 ∈ ℤ, hs1 ∈ ℕ)
  dvdsval2(hs1, hs0)
  imbi12d(c0 =(hs0[÷]hs1), ∀(s0 ∈ Prime, 0[≤](s0[pCnt]c0)), c0 ∈ ℤ, ∀(s0 ∈ Prime, 0[≤](s0[pCnt](hs0[÷]hs1))), (hs0[÷]hs1)∈ ℤ)
  ralbidv(s0, cprime, c0 =(hs0[÷]hs1), 0[≤](s0[pCnt]c0), 0[≤](s0[pCnt](hs0[÷]hs1)))
  breq2d(nat0, cle, (s0[pCnt]c0), (s0[pCnt](hs0[÷]hs1)), c0 =(hs0[÷]hs1))
  oveq2(c0, (hs0[÷]hs1), s0, cpc)
  eleq1(c0, (hs0[÷]hs1), cz)

  diff.hs1.w((∀(s0 ∈ Prime, 0[≤](s0[pCnt]c0))→ c0 ∈ ℤ))

blocks.name: pcprmpw2
blocks.content: Self-referential expression for a prime power. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pcprmpw2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wb(wrex(s0, cn0, wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, co(c0, cexp, co(c0, cpc, c1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

blocks.name: pcprmpw
blocks.content: Self-referential expression for a prime power. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pcprmpw(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wb(wrex(s0, cn0, wceq(c1, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, co(c0, cexp, co(c0, cpc, c1)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wrex(s0, cn0, wceq(c1, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, co(c0, cexp, co(c0, cpc, c1))))
  sylibd(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wrex(s0, cn0, wceq(c1, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)))), wceq(c1, co(c0, cexp, co(c0, cpc, c1))), wrex(s0, cn0, wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)))))
  reximdva(s0, cn0, wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wceq(c1, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0))), wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0))))
  syl5ibrcom(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wcel(cv(s0), cn0)), wceq(c1, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0))), wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0))), wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0))))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wcel(cv(s0), cn0)), wbr(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cdvds, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0))), wcel(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cz))
  sylan(wa(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn)), wcel(cv(s0), cn0), wcel(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), cz), wcel(c0, cz))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c0, cz))
  prmz(c0)
  zexpcl(c0, cv(s0))
  iddvds(co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)))

  oveq2(cv(s0), co(c0, cpc, c1), c0, cexp)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn))

thm pcprmpw(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ)→(∃(s0 ∈ ℕ0, c1 =(c0[^]s0))↔ c1 =(c0[^](c0[pCnt]c1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)

} = {
  impbid((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ), ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ0, c1 =(c0[^]s0)), c1 =(c0[^](c0[pCnt]c1)))
  sylibd((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ), ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ0, c1 =(c0[^]s0)), c1 =(c0[^](c0[pCnt]c1)), ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ0, c1[||](c0[^]s0)))
  reximdva(s0, cn0, (c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ), c1 =(c0[^]s0), c1[||](c0[^]s0))
  syl5ibrcom(((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ)∧ s0 ∈ ℕ0), c1 =(c0[^]s0), c1[||](c0[^]s0), (c0[^]s0)[||](c0[^]s0))
  syl(((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ)∧ s0 ∈ ℕ0), (c0[^]s0)[||](c0[^]s0), (c0[^]s0)∈ ℤ)
  sylan((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ), s0 ∈ ℕ0, (c0[^]s0)∈ ℤ, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Prime, c1 ∈ ℕ, c0 ∈ ℤ)
  prmz(c0)
  zexpcl(c0, s0)
  iddvds((c0[^]s0))
  breq1(c1, (c0[^]s0), cdvds, (c0[^]s0))
  pcprmpw2(s0, c0, c1)
  syl((c0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ), (c1 =(c0[^](c0[pCnt]c1))→ ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ0, c1 =(c0[^]s0))), (c0[pCnt]c1)∈ ℕ0)
  pccl(c0, c1)
  ex((c0[pCnt]c1)∈ ℕ0, c1 =(c0[^](c0[pCnt]c1)), ∃(s0 ∈ ℕ0, c1 =(c0[^]s0)))
  rspceeqv(s0, (c0[pCnt]c1), cn0, c1, (c0[^](c0[pCnt]c1)), (c0[^]s0))

blocks.name: dvdsprmpweq
blocks.content: If a positive integer divides a prime power, it is a prime power. (Contributed by AV, 25-Jul-2021.)

thm dvdsprmpweq(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c2)), wrex(s0, cn0, wceq(c1, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)))))
  rspcedvd(s0, cn0, co(c0, cpc, c1), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c2))), wceq(c1, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0))), wceq(c1, co(c0, cexp, co(c0, cpc, c1))))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c2)), wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cn0))
  pccld(c0, c1, w3a(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn0)))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn0))
  simp2(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn0))
  adantl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c2))), wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, cpc, c1)), wb(wceq(c1, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0))), wceq(c1, co(c0, cexp, co(c0, cpc, c1)))))
  eqeq2d(c1, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), co(c0, cexp, co(c0, cpc, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), co(c0, cpc, c1)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), co(c0, cpc, c1), c0, cexp)
  mpbid(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c2))), wceq(c1, co(c0, cexp, co(c0, cpc, c1))), wrex(s0, cn0, wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)))))
  rspcedvd(s0, cn0, c2, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c2))), wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0))), wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c2)))
  simpl3(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn0), wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c2)))
  adantl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cn), wcel(c2, cn0)), wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c2))), wceq(cv(s0), c2), wb(wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0))), wbr(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, c2))))
  breq2d(c1, cdvds, co(c0, cexp, cv(s0)), co(c0, cexp, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c2))

blocks.name: difsqpwdvds
blocks.content: If the difference of two squares is a power of a prime, the prime divides twice the second squared number. (Contributed by AV, 13-Aug-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm difsqpwdvds(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

blocks.name: pcaddlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ pcadd . The original numbers ` A ` and ` B ` have been decomposed using the prime count function as ` ( P ^ M ) x. ( R / S ) ` where ` R , S ` are both not divisible by ` P ` and ` M = ( P pCnt A ) ` , and similarly for ` B ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: pcadd
blocks.content: An inequality for the prime count of a sum. This is the source of the ultrametric inequality for the p-adic metric. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: pcadd2
blocks.content: The inequality of ~ pcadd becomes an equality when one of the factors has prime count strictly less than the other. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Jan-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm pcadd2(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cpc, c1), co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cprime))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cq))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cq))
  -| wi(w0, wbr(co(c0, cpc, c1), clt, co(c0, cpc, c2)))
} = {
  xrletrid(co(c0, cpc, c1), co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2)), w0)
  pcadd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  xrltled(co(c0, cpc, c1), co(c0, cpc, c2), w0)
  breqtrd(co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2)), cle, co(c0, cpc, c1), co(c0, cpc, co(co(c1, caddc, c2), caddc, cneg(c2))), w0)
  pcadd(c0, co(c1, caddc, c2), cneg(c2), w0)
  breqtrrd(co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2)), cle, co(c0, cpc, cneg(c2)), co(c0, cpc, c2), w0)
  xrltled(co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2)), co(c0, cpc, c2), w0)
  mpbird(w0, wbr(co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2)), clt, co(c0, cpc, c2)), wn(wbr(co(c0, cpc, c2), cle, co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2)))))
  mtod(w0, wbr(co(c0, cpc, c2), cle, co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2))), wbr(co(c0, cpc, c2), cle, co(c0, cpc, c1)))
  mpbid(w0, wn(wbr(co(c0, cpc, c2), cle, co(c0, cpc, c1))), wbr(co(c0, cpc, c1), clt, co(c0, cpc, c2)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(co(c0, cpc, c1), clt, co(c0, cpc, c2)), wn(wbr(co(c0, cpc, c2), cle, co(c0, cpc, c1)))), wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cxr), wcel(co(c0, cpc, c2), cxr))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, cpc, c1), cxr), wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(c1, cq))
  pcxcl(c0, c1)
  xrltnle(co(c0, cpc, c1), co(c0, cpc, c2))
  sylibd(w0, wbr(co(c0, cpc, c2), cle, co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2))), wbr(co(c0, cpc, c2), cle, co(c0, cpc, c1)), wbr(co(c0, cpc, cneg(c2)), cle, co(c0, cpc, co(cneg(c2), caddc, co(c1, caddc, c2)))))
  ex(w0, wbr(co(c0, cpc, c2), cle, co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2))), wbr(co(c0, cpc, cneg(c2)), cle, co(c0, cpc, co(cneg(c2), caddc, co(c1, caddc, c2)))))
  pcadd(c0, cneg(c2), co(c1, caddc, c2), wa(w0, wbr(co(c0, cpc, c2), cle, co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2)))))
  adantr(w0, wbr(co(c0, cpc, c2), cle, co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2))), wcel(c0, cprime))
  adantr(w0, wbr(co(c0, cpc, c2), cle, co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2))), wcel(cneg(c2), cq))
  syl(w0, wcel(cneg(c2), cq), wcel(c2, cq))
  qnegcl(c2)
  adantr(w0, wbr(co(c0, cpc, c2), cle, co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2))), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c2), cq))
  biimpar(w0, wbr(co(c0, cpc, c2), cle, co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2))), wbr(co(c0, cpc, cneg(c2)), cle, co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2))))
  breq1d(co(c0, cpc, cneg(c2)), cle, co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2)), co(c0, cpc, c2), w0)
  breq12d(co(c0, cpc, cneg(c2)), cle, co(c0, cpc, co(cneg(c2), caddc, co(c1, caddc, c2))), co(c0, cpc, c2), co(c0, cpc, c1), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cpc, co(cneg(c2), caddc, co(c1, caddc, c2)), c1, w0)
  3eqtrd(co(cneg(c2), caddc, co(c1, caddc, c2)), c1, co(c1, caddc, co(cneg(c2), caddc, c2)), co(c1, caddc, nat0), w0)
  add12d(cneg(c2), c1, c2, w0)
  oveq2d(c1, caddc, co(cneg(c2), caddc, c2), nat0, w0)
  eqtrd(co(cneg(c2), caddc, c2), nat0, co(c2, caddc, cneg(c2)), w0)

  syl2anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, cpc, co(c1, caddc, c2)), cxr), wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(co(c1, caddc, c2), cq))

thm pcadd2(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[pCnt]c1)=(c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Prime)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ ℚ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ ℚ)
  ⊣ (w0 →(c0[pCnt]c1)[<](c0[pCnt]c2))
} = {
  xrletrid((c0[pCnt]c1), (c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2)), w0)
  pcadd(c0, c1, c2, w0)
  xrltled((c0[pCnt]c1), (c0[pCnt]c2), w0)
  breqtrd((c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2)), cle, (c0[pCnt]c1), (c0[pCnt]((c1[+]c2)[+]-u(c2))), w0)
  pcadd(c0, (c1[+]c2), -u(c2), w0)
  breqtrrd((c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2)), cle, (c0[pCnt]-u(c2)), (c0[pCnt]c2), w0)
  xrltled((c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2)), (c0[pCnt]c2), w0)
  mpbird(w0, (c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2))[<](c0[pCnt]c2), ¬(c0[pCnt]c2)[≤](c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2)))
  mtod(w0, (c0[pCnt]c2)[≤](c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2)), (c0[pCnt]c2)[≤](c0[pCnt]c1))
  mpbid(w0, ¬(c0[pCnt]c2)[≤](c0[pCnt]c1), (c0[pCnt]c1)[<](c0[pCnt]c2))
  syl2anc(w0, ((c0[pCnt]c1)[<](c0[pCnt]c2)↔ ¬(c0[pCnt]c2)[≤](c0[pCnt]c1)), (c0[pCnt]c1)∈ ℝ*, (c0[pCnt]c2)∈ ℝ*)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[pCnt]c1)∈ ℝ*, c0 ∈ Prime, c1 ∈ ℚ)
  pcxcl(c0, c1)
  xrltnle((c0[pCnt]c1), (c0[pCnt]c2))
  sylibd(w0, (c0[pCnt]c2)[≤](c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2)), (c0[pCnt]c2)[≤](c0[pCnt]c1), (c0[pCnt]-u(c2))[≤](c0[pCnt](-u(c2)[+](c1[+]c2))))
  ex(w0, (c0[pCnt]c2)[≤](c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2)), (c0[pCnt]-u(c2))[≤](c0[pCnt](-u(c2)[+](c1[+]c2))))
  pcadd(c0, -u(c2), (c1[+]c2), (w0 ∧(c0[pCnt]c2)[≤](c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2))))
  adantr(w0, (c0[pCnt]c2)[≤](c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2)), c0 ∈ Prime)
  adantr(w0, (c0[pCnt]c2)[≤](c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2)), -u(c2)∈ ℚ)
  syl(w0, -u(c2)∈ ℚ, c2 ∈ ℚ)
  qnegcl(c2)
  adantr(w0, (c0[pCnt]c2)[≤](c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2)), (c1[+]c2)∈ ℚ)
  biimpar(w0, (c0[pCnt]c2)[≤](c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2)), (c0[pCnt]-u(c2))[≤](c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2)))
  breq1d((c0[pCnt]-u(c2)), cle, (c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2)), (c0[pCnt]c2), w0)
  breq12d((c0[pCnt]-u(c2)), cle, (c0[pCnt](-u(c2)[+](c1[+]c2))), (c0[pCnt]c2), (c0[pCnt]c1), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, cpc, (-u(c2)[+](c1[+]c2)), c1, w0)
  3eqtrd((-u(c2)[+](c1[+]c2)), c1, (c1[+](-u(c2)[+]c2)), (c1[+]0), w0)
  add12d(-u(c2), c1, c2, w0)
  oveq2d(c1, caddc, (-u(c2)[+]c2), nat0, w0)
  eqtrd((-u(c2)[+]c2), nat0, (c2[+]-u(c2)), w0)
  addcomd(-u(c2), c2, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2))[<](c0[pCnt]c2)↔ ¬(c0[pCnt]c2)[≤](c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2))), (c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2))∈ ℝ*, (c0[pCnt]c2)∈ ℝ*)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2))∈ ℝ*, c0 ∈ Prime, (c1[+]c2)∈ ℚ)
  syl2anc(w0, (c1[+]c2)∈ ℚ, c1 ∈ ℚ, c2 ∈ ℚ)
  qaddcl(c1, c2)
  pcxcl(c0, (c1[+]c2))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[pCnt]c2)∈ ℝ*, c0 ∈ Prime, c2 ∈ ℚ)
  pcxcl(c0, c2)
  xrltnle((c0[pCnt](c1[+]c2)), (c0[pCnt]c2))
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[pCnt]-u(c2))=(c0[pCnt]c2), c0 ∈ Prime, c2 ∈ ℚ)
  pcneg(c0, c2)
  oveq2d(c0, cpc, ((c1[+]c2)[+]-u(c2)), c1, w0)
  3eqtrd(((c1[+]c2)[+]-u(c2)), c1, (c1[+](c2[+]-u(c2))), (c1[+]0), w0)
  addassd(c1, c2, -u(c2), w0)
  negcld(c2, w0)
  oveq2d(c1, caddc, (c2[+]-u(c2)), nat0, w0)
  negidd(c2, w0)
  syl(w0, c2 ∈ ℂ, c2 ∈ ℚ)
  qcn(c2)
  addid1d(c1, w0)
  syl(w0, c1 ∈ ℂ, c1 ∈ ℚ)
  qcn(c1)
}

thm pcmptcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wf(c0, cn, cn), wf(cseq(nat1, cmul, c0), cn, cn)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cn, cif(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cprime))))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, cprime, wcel(c1, cn0)))
} = {
  jca(w0, wf(c0, cn, cn), wf(cseq(nat1, cmul, c0), cn, cn))
  seqf(hs0, hs1, nat1, cmul, c0, cn, cn, w0)
  nnuz()
  1zzd(w0)
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), cn, c0, cn, w0)
  sylib(w0, wf(c0, cn, cn), wral(s0, cn, wcel(cif(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), cn)))
  syl(w0, wral(s0, cn, wcel(cif(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), cn)), wral(s0, cprime, wcel(c1, cn0)))
  ralimi2(s0, cprime, cn, wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(cif(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), cn))
  a1d(wi(wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cv(s0), cn), wcel(cif(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), cn))
  pm2.61i(wi(wi(wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cif(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), cn)), wcel(cv(s0), cprime))
  syld(wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cif(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), cn), wcel(c1, cn0))
  pm2.27(wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wcel(c1, cn0))
  ex(wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(cif(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), cn))
  eqeltrd(cif(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), cn, co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wcel(c1, cn0)))
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wcel(c1, cn0), wceq(cif(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), co(cv(s0), cexp, c1)))
  iftrue(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cprime))
  sylan(wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wcel(c1, cn0), wcel(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), cn), wcel(cv(s0), cn))
  prmnn(cv(s0))
  nnexpcl(cv(s0), c1)
  a1d(wn(wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), cprime), wcel(c1, cn0)), wcel(cif(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), cn))
  syl6eqel(cif(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), cn, nat1, wn(wcel(cv(s0), cprime)))
  iffalse(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cprime))
  1nn()
  fmpt(s0, cn, cif(co(cv(s0), cexp, c1), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cprime)), cn, c0)
  adantl(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wcel(cv(hs1), cn)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cn))
  nnmulcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(cmul)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs1.c(nat1)
  diff.hs1.c(cmul)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cn)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

thm pcmptcl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0 : ℕ → ℕ)∧(seq(1(×, c0)): ℕ → ℕ)))
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ ℕ ↦ if(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[^]c1), 1))
  ⊣ (w0 → ∀(s0 ∈ Prime, c1 ∈ ℕ0))
} = {
  jca(w0, (c0 : ℕ → ℕ), (seq(1(×, c0)): ℕ → ℕ))
  seqf(hs0, hs1, nat1, cmul, c0, cn, cn, w0)
  nnuz()
  1zzd(w0)
  ffvelrnda(hs0, cn, c0, cn, w0)
  sylib(w0, (c0 : ℕ → ℕ), ∀(s0 ∈ ℕ, if(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[^]c1), 1)∈ ℕ))
  syl(w0, ∀(s0 ∈ ℕ, if(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[^]c1), 1)∈ ℕ), ∀(s0 ∈ Prime, c1 ∈ ℕ0))
  ralimi2(s0, cprime, cn, c1 ∈ ℕ0, if(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[^]c1), 1)∈ ℕ)
  a1d((s0 ∈ Prime → c1 ∈ ℕ0), s0 ∈ ℕ, if(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[^]c1), 1)∈ ℕ)
  pm2.61i(((s0 ∈ Prime → c1 ∈ ℕ0)→ if(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[^]c1), 1)∈ ℕ), s0 ∈ Prime)
  syld(s0 ∈ Prime, (s0 ∈ Prime → c1 ∈ ℕ0), if(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[^]c1), 1)∈ ℕ, c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  pm2.27(s0 ∈ Prime, c1 ∈ ℕ0)
  ex(s0 ∈ Prime, c1 ∈ ℕ0, if(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[^]c1), 1)∈ ℕ)
  eqeltrd(if(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[^]c1), 1), cn, (s0[^]c1), (s0 ∈ Prime ∧ c1 ∈ ℕ0))
  adantr(s0 ∈ Prime, c1 ∈ ℕ0, if(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[^]c1), 1)=(s0[^]c1))
  iftrue((s0[^]c1), nat1, s0 ∈ Prime)
  sylan(s0 ∈ Prime, c1 ∈ ℕ0, (s0[^]c1)∈ ℕ, s0 ∈ ℕ)
  prmnn(s0)
  nnexpcl(s0, c1)
  a1d(¬ s0 ∈ Prime, (s0 ∈ Prime → c1 ∈ ℕ0), if(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[^]c1), 1)∈ ℕ)
  syl6eqel(if(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[^]c1), 1), cn, nat1, ¬ s0 ∈ Prime)
  iffalse((s0[^]c1), nat1, s0 ∈ Prime)
  1nn()
  fmpt(s0, cn, if(s0 ∈ Prime,(s0[^]c1), 1), cn, c0)
  adantl(w0, (hs0 ∈ ℕ ∧ hs1 ∈ ℕ), (hs0[×]hs1)∈ ℕ)
  nnmulcl(hs0, hs1)
  diff.cn.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs0.c(cmul)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cn)
  diff.hs1.c(nat1)
  diff.hs1.c(cmul)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cn)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: pcmpt2
blocks.content: Dividing two prime count maps yields a number with all dividing primes confined to an interval. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm pcmpt2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, cpc, co(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c2), cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c3))), cif(c4, nat0, wa(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c3))))))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cn, cif(co(cv(s0), cexp, c5), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cprime))))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, cprime, wcel(c5, cn0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cn))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cprime))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c5, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cfv(cuz, c3)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(c0, cpc, co(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c2), cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c3))), cif(c4, nat0, wa(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c3)))), co(co(c0, cpc, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c2)), cmin, co(c0, cpc, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c3))), co(cif(c4, nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c2)), cmin, cif(c4, nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c3))), w0)
  syl121anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, cpc, co(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c2), cdiv, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c3))), co(co(c0, cpc, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c2)), cmin, co(c0, cpc, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c3)))), wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c2), cz), wne(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c2), nat0), wcel(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c3), cn))
  nnzd(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c2), w0)
  nnne0d(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c2), w0)
  ffvelrnd(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c2, cn, cn, w0)
  ffvelrnd(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c3, cn, cn, w0)
  simprd(w0, wf(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), cn, cn), wf(c1, cn, cn))
  pcmptcl(s0, c1, c5, w0)
  pcdiv(c0, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c2), cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c3))
  oveq12d(co(c0, cpc, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c2)), cmin, co(c0, cpc, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c3)), cif(c4, nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c2)), cif(c4, nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c3)), w0)
  pcmpt(s0, c0, c1, c2, c4, c5, w0)
  pcmpt(s0, c0, c1, c3, c4, c5, w0)
  pm2.61dan(w0, wceq(co(cif(c4, nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c2)), cmin, cif(c4, nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c3))), cif(c4, nat0, wa(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c3))))), wbr(c0, cle, c3))
  3eqtr4d(co(cif(c4, nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c2)), cmin, cif(c4, nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c3))), cif(c4, nat0, wa(wbr(c0, cle, c2), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c3)))), co(c4, cmin, c4), nat0, wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c3)))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c3), wceq(co(c4, cmin, c4), nat0))
  subidd(c4, w0)
  oveq12d(cif(c4, nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c2)), cmin, cif(c4, nat0, wbr(c0, cle, c3)), c4, c4, wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c3)))
  iftrued(c4, nat0, wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c3)), wbr(c0, cle, c2))
  letrd(c0, c2, c3, wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c3)))

blocks.name: pcprod
blocks.content: The product of the primes taken to their respective powers reconstructs the original number. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm pcprod(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c0), c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cn, cif(co(cv(s0), cexp, co(cv(s0), cpc, c0)), nat1, wcel(cv(s0), cprime))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  mpbird(wcel(c0, cn), wceq(cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c0), c0), wral(hs0, cprime, wceq(co(cv(hs0), cpc, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c0)), co(cv(hs0), cpc, c0))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cprime, wcel(c0, cn), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cpc, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c0)), co(cv(hs0), cpc, c0)))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cpc, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c0)), co(cv(hs0), cpc, c0)))
  eqtrd(co(cv(hs0), cpc, cfv(cseq(nat1, cmul, c1), c0)), co(cv(hs0), cpc, c0), cif(co(cv(hs0), cpc, c0), nat0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(c0, cn)))
  pcmpt(s0, cv(hs0), c1, c0, co(cv(hs0), cpc, c0), co(cv(s0), cpc, c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(c0, cn)))
  adantl(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(c0, cn), wral(s0, cprime, wcel(co(cv(s0), cpc, c0), cn0)))
  simpr(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(c0, cn))
  simpl(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(c0, cn))

  pm2.61dan(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cprime), wcel(c0, cn)), wceq(cif(co(cv(hs0), cpc, c0), nat0, wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0)), co(cv(hs0), cpc, c0)), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, c0))

blocks.name: sumhash
blocks.content: The sum of 1 over a set is the size of the set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Mar-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 20-May-2014.)

blocks.name: pcbc
blocks.content: Calculate the prime count of a binomial coefficient. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Mar-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:

  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(c2, cprime)), wceq(co(c2, cpc, co(c0, cbc, c1)), csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, co(c2, cexp, cv(s0)))), cmin, co(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cexp, cv(s0)))), caddc, cfv(cfl, co(c1, cdiv, co(c2, cexp, cv(s0)))))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(c2, cpc, co(c0, cbc, c1)), csu(s0, co(nat1, cfz, c0), co(cfv(cfl, co(c0, cdiv, co(c2, cexp, cv(s0)))), cmin, co(cfv(cfl, co(co(c0, cmin, c1), cdiv, co(c2, cexp, cv(s0)))), caddc, cfv(cfl, co(c1, cdiv, co(c2, cexp, cv(s0))))))), co(c2, cpc, co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c1)))), co(co(c2, cpc, cfv(cfa, c0)), cmin, co(c2, cpc, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c1)))), w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(c2, cprime)))
  syl121anc(w3a(wcel(c0, cn), wcel(c1, co(nat0, cfz, c0)), wcel(c2, cprime)), wceq(co(c2, cpc, co(cfv(cfa, c0), cdiv, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c1)))), co(co(c2, cpc, cfv(cfa, c0)), cmin, co(c2, cpc, co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c1))))), wcel(c2, cprime), wcel(cfv(cfa, c0), cz), wne(cfv(cfa, c0), nat0), wcel(co(cfv(cfa, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cmul, cfv(cfa, c1)), cn))

blocks.name: qexpz
blocks.content: If a power of a rational number is an integer, then the number is an integer. In other words, all n-th roots are irrational unless they are integers (so that the original number is an n-th power). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: expnprm
blocks.content: A second or higher power of a rational number is not a prime number. Or by contraposition, the n-th root of a prime number is irrational. Suggested by Norm Megill. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Aug-2015.)
